content: the ararat sweater vest is a stunning garment with excellent drape and amazing texture this is a sweater vest that will go with anything and become a staple in the wardrobe sizes range from s - 5xl and there is a bit extra positive ease included considering we are expecting to wear an undershirt and a button up shirt underneath for the main portion body of the vest we use the alternating single_crochet spike stitch and for the chest we use the beautiful alpine stitch grab your hook and let s make one
